typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [dbo].[Customer] where country=\'USA\'',
	format: 'query') ~> Customer
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrderNumber as string,
		CustomerId as integer,
		TotalAmount as decimal(12,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Order
Customer, Order lookup(Customer@Id == CustomerId,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(greater(TotalAmount, 5000)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		City,
		Country,
		Phone
	)) ~> sink1
